c74object.name: stemversion
c74object.digest: Generates a version symbol based on the current timestamp.
c74object.description: The `stemversion` object is a simple utility that, upon receiving a `bang`, outputs a symbol representing the current date and time. This is useful for creating unique version identifiers for files or projects.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Output the current timestamp as a symbol.
method.description: When the object receives a `bang`, it gets the current system time and formats it into a symbol with the structure `[year-month-day-hour-minute-second]`. The year is four digits, while all other numbers are one or two digits (no leading zeros).

inlet.name: in
inlet.description: Sends a `bang` to trigger the timestamp generation.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: Outputs a symbol formatted with surrounding square brackets, e.g., `[2025-12-8-15-19-15]`.
